/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -shared -Wl,-soname,libthrust_sort.so -o libthrust_sort.so CMakeFiles/thrust_sort.dir/thrust_sort_wrapper.cu.o   -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.7/cuda/12.5/lib64  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.7/math_libs/12.5/lib64  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.7/comm_libs/12.5/nccl/lib  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.7/comm_libs/12.5/nvshmem/lib  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.7/cuda/12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/24.7/cuda/12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
